data.message: Dude. I consider it an honor to be able to spend my money on this album. I love your music - it gives me hope, inspiration, and strength. This new album has so much fucking heart. I would say this might be your best album of all time. I know you don't know me but I have mad respect for you. You are my idol....you have been a role model for me. I love your music man....It has saved my life I swear. I've watched you mature so fucking much. I'm so happy you're clean man. Much love comin from Sacramento, CA. Thank you for blessing this world with your amazing music.
